ValidationRule.description: this rule restricts case status transition from Closed to any other status
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR ( AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL((Status),'In Progress')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL((Status),'New')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL((Status),'Vendor Hold')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL((Status),'Resolved')), AND ( RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Technical_Support',ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status), 'Closed'), ISPICKVAL((Status),'Waiting for Customer Response'))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You can't change the staus on a Closed Case. Please create a new Case.
